statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE location='New York';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM air_quality_measurements;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level FROM air_quality_measurements GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_pollutant_level, location FROM air_quality_measurements GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pollutant_level > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT location, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_level FROM air_quality_measurements GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(pollutant_level) > 50 ORDER BY average_level DESC;
SELECT pollutant_type, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY pollutant_type ORDER BY total_measurements DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, pollutant_type, location, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE location LIKE 'Los Angeles%' ORDER BY sensor_id, pollutant_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM PollutionSensors
SELECT location, measurement_unit, measurement_timestamp FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_value > 50
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM PollutionSensors WHERE last_calibration_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) AS average_measurement_value FROM AirQualityMeasurements
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_unit = 'ppm' ORDER BY measurement_timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM PollutionSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'CO2' LIMIT 10

SELECT sensor_id, location, measurement_value FROM AirQualityMeasurements JOIN PollutionSensors ON AirQualityMeasurements.sensor_id = PollutionSensors.sensor_id WHERE measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY location ASC, measurement_timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) AS average_measurement_value, location FROM AirQualityMeasurements GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(measurement_value) > 30 ORDER BY average_measurement_value DESC

SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM PollutionSensors LEFT JOIN AirQualityMeasurements ON PollutionSensors.sensor_id = AirQualityMeasurements.sensor_id WHERE AirQualityMeasurements.sensor_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY measurement_datetime ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_location, installation_date FROM pollution_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, operational, last_update FROM sensor_status WHERE operational = TRUE ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT measurement_id, sensor_id, location, pollutant_type, measurement_datetime FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE location LIKE '%City%' OR location LIKE '%Town%' ORDER BY measurement_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements
SELECT sensor_id, location, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pollutant_level > 50
SELECT sensor_location, installation_date FROM pollution_sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT pollutant_type, AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_level FROM air_quality_measurements GROUP BY pollutant_type
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(status_id) AS total_status_updates FROM sensor_status GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_status_updates > 5
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensor;
SELECT location_name, measurement_time FROM AirQualitySensor ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT pollutant_type, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_level FROM AirQualitySensor GROUP BY pollutant_type;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT sensor_id, alert_time FROM PollutionAlert ORDER BY alert_time;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensor;
SELECT location_name, measurement_time, pollutant_type FROM AirQualitySensor WHERE pollutant_level > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, city, latitude, longitude FROM AirQualitySensor AS aqs INNER JOIN SensorLocation AS sl ON aqs.location_name = sl.location_name;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensor WHERE measurement_time >= '2021-01-01' AND measurement_time <= '2021-01-31';
SELECT aqs.sensor_id, aqs.location_name, pt.pollutant_name, pt.unit FROM AirQualitySensor AS aqs INNER JOIN PollutantType AS pt ON aqs.pollutant_type = pt.pollutant_name;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements;
SELECT sensor_id, measurement_value FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT measurement_time, pollutant_type FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, measurement_value FROM AirQualityMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors JOIN Locations ON Sensors.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2'
SELECT measurement_time, measurement_value FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) AS average_value, pollutant_type FROM AirQualityMeasurements GROUP BY pollutant_type
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Locations.city, Sensors.sensor_type FROM Sensors JOIN Locations ON Sensors.location_id = Locations.location_id
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM MonitoringEvents WHERE event_id % 2 = 0
